page.title: 12EVENTS-A FRIENDSHIP CLUB
page.content: THE MONTHLY MEETING OF THE GREAT HORKESLEY FRIENDSHIP CLUB WAS HELD AT THE OAKS,IVY LODGE ROAD,AT THE KIND INVITATION OF MRS CRICK,WHEN THE WEATHER WAS VERY FAVOURABLE FOR ENJOY- ING THE BEAUTIFUL GARDEN.THERE WERE TWO MINUTES SILENCE IN MEMORY OF THE LATE MR FRANK BULLOCK,AND THEN MRS GREEN PAID TRIBUTE TO THIS DEDICATED AND WELL LOVED MEMBER.THE STALL AND RAFFLE WERE VERY WELL SUPPORTED,AND WHILE SOME MEMBERS EXPLORED THE GARDEN AND THE LAKE,OTHERS ENJOYED A GAME OF BOWLS ON THE LAWN.MRS GREEN PROPOSED A VOTE OF THANKS TO MRS CRICK FOR HER HOSPITALITY.THE NEXT MEETING OF THE CLUB WILL BE AFTER THE SUMMER HOLIDAYS.AND WILL TAKE PLACE ON FRIDAY 6 SEPTEMBER AT THE WI HALL,WHEN ALL SENIOR CITIZENS WILL BE WELLCOME AT 2.30. FROM THE CLUB SECRETARY.
